before we start thinking about the cloud
you know what have we sort of been doing

and these are these are very valuable
and we have to keep doing them but the

sometimes not it depends on the on the
data and then there's a catalog a
discovery peas kind of floating out

dated NOAA gov and you can go there see
about 60,000 data sets and so and then

premises before they can start working

there and that's great sometimes but
it's very difficult obviously when the

in 2014 february2014 we issued the
original RFI request for information
just to see if industry would be would

and the idea was you know we've got our

we've got our model outputs and we're

only copy out we have the master copy

individual lines of business would this

we have tons of other kinds of data are

the reason we haven't gotten the value

satellite data and bowie data and so
